original_text: So we do not look at the things that we can see in this world. Instead, we look at the things that people cannot see. The things that we can see are only here for a short time. But the things that we cannot see will continue for ever.
korean_text: 우리가 주목하는 것은 보이는 것이 아니요 보이지 않는 것이니 보이는 것은 잠깐이요 보이지 않는 것은 영원함이라

sentences.original_text: So we do not look at the things
that we can see in this world
sentences.korean_translation: 우리가 이 세상에서 볼 수 있는

sentences.original_text: Instead, we look at the things
The things that we can see
are only here for a short time
But the things that we cannot see
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 우리가 볼 수 없는 것들은
